title: France goes all-in for nuclear in new energy roadmap
summary_full: PARIS – France remains committed to nuclear power and will be more cautious about building up solar capacity over the next 9 years, the French government said on Thursday when presenting a long-delayed energy plan. This roadmap confirms a U-turn by Paris over an earlier plan to progressively switch off its huge fleet of nuclear […]
